m_szDocTitle: Rasa city car has no gears and is powered by hydrogen but its top speed is just 60mph | Daily Mail Online
m_szDocSumamry: Rasa city car has no gears and is powered by hydrogen but its top speed is just 60mph Â  1.2k shares The car of the future that runs on THIN AIR: Electric Rasa vehicle powered by a hydrogen cell in the boot is 'safer than petrol cars' thanks to a pressurised tank (just don't mention the Hindenberg) The Rasa runs on electricity generated by a hydrogen fuel cell and gives the equivalent of '250 miles to the gallon' It reaches its top speed of 60mph (97km/h) in ten seconds and has a range of 300 miles on 1.5kg of hydrogen There are no gears - just buttons for forward, neutral or reverse, plus an a
